name: Match (itch) (ignitusstudios)
description:
This is a basic matching game I've created using cards for another project I'm working on that I may release on itch.io at some point. Match all the cards to complete the game. this is a basic barebones project that I may continue to build upon. but for the most part, it's just a fun simple game. 

notes: to pull up the pause menu, press ESC

in the gallery, if you click one card and then another before clicking the inial card it will just switch between those two cards and you will not be able to close it until you click on the initial card while it's showing.
